participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for music and a love for spending time with his children.
participant_1.background: I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. What's up? I am a 46 year old single dad with kids. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year. I prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, with a deep appreciation for nature and literature.
participant_2.background: I'm partly deaf. I grow roses in my garden. I've a big library at home. I am a museum tour guide. I love to drink fancy tea.

content.text: Hey! Do you love to read?
